website_summaries.verdict: Large capacity fat separator with a smart design that separates oil and fat without dripping or spills.
pros: Has an easy-grip handle, so you can control the container
Top strainer section works efficiently to remove larger pieces from your liquid
Uses a specially designed plug at the bottom of the cup to prevent unwanted drips
Entire product consists of a heat resistant plastic for safe usage
cons: Markings in ounces and milliliters on side of cup are not easy to see

customer_reviews.title: Versatility is Key (Kitchenware)
customer_reviews.text: I recently decided to purchase this product because of its versatility. The opportunities are endless with this product. Wether it be used as a fat separator for gravy, soup, dressings, etc. or even as a measuring cup, you can always find a use for this product. I recently got mine in the mail and I am already in love. It did not take long for this product to find its way into my day-to-day kitchen routine. I can’t wait to buy more from this company!

customer_reviews.title: Is This a Fat Separator?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size with sturdy material. I couldn’t wait for Thanksgiving to make my gravy. I poured the drippings into the container and immediately the counter was flooded! I had not made sure the insert was plugged in tightly and lost most of the good stuff while making a royal mess! After lunch I took a better look st it and found that to actually separate the fat you have to let the brothy liquid out the bottom. Not really what I wanted. There is no spout at the bottom. It would be nice for pancakes I guess.
